services.title: Talent Acquisition Expert
services.text: We leverage on our rich, diverse, and experienced talent pool to deliver effective staffing and recruitment solutions to our clients. We find the best combination of exemplary skills and cultural fit for our clients, thus matching people with growth and success. We specialize in identifying candidates and use our extensive database and innovative screening platforms to locate top talent, flush them to the surface, and attract them to your organization. We take the initiative to help you zero in and acquire the best on the market.

services.title: Executive Search
services.text: Attract Leading Executives who outperform your expectations. You can trust us to be your partner by using our proven methodology to cut through the uncertainty. As an expert, our framework is built to assess how an executive’s vision pairs with your company culture for achieving generational growth.

subServices.title: Retained Search
subServices.text: Our success in retained search is built on listening, collaborating, and communicating precisely. Whether you’re seeking expertise in enterprise solutions like SAP, Oracle, Microsoft, or IBM or require a unique blend of disparate skill sets, we draw from our talent pool and then proceed in a consultative fashion to efficiently secure a qualified candidate roster.

subServices.title: Corporate Staffing
subServices.text: While we’ve long recruited tech positions and teams for diverse markets, we do more than IT staffing. We also recruit top managers for you—Senior Managers, Directors, and VPs. You can trust us to secure the People that Power your Business.

subServices.title: Contingency Search
subServices.text: Our contingency search is a smart alternative. From corporate functions to supervisors and management-level positions, you’ll benefit from our deep candidate research and highly-qualified pool of top talent. We find A+ candidates to fill your toughest roles fast, and only get compensated when ours are hired.

services.title: Recruiting Process Outsourcing (RPO)
services.text: Positioning for Performance and Growth. Whether you need to hand off some or all of your recruiting process, our RPO experts can seamlessly integrate with your internal resources to build on and build out their effort.

subServices.title: Urgent Demand Staffing
subServices.text: For Seasonal Workforce, Product Rollouts, Implementations and more, we take ownership of your recruiting process by bringing people, technology, and processes together to efficiently meet project demands. • We apply our CIMS methodology- Collaborative, Integrated Managed Services- to your RPO effort to ensure a seamless, strategic approach. • Our RPO teams are true experts who closely manage your project. We are SCRUM, PMP and SHRM certified as well as Data Analytics Masters.  • We handle everything from scoping project plans, using dashboards for performance reporting and managing urgent demand RPO projects straight through to completion

subServices.title: Project Staffing
subServices.text: We bring right candidates on board when needed, as needed to make progress happen for your company when you need to ramp up staff.     • We coordinate offshore resources and onshore staff to continously provides the highest level of global project support.    • We make staff augmentation easy so projects can be completed on-time and on-budget.

subServices.title: Our RPO combines the following Three Pillars
subServices.text: We bring right candidates on board when needed, as needed to make progress happen for your company when you need to ramp up staff.     • We coordinate offshore resources and onshore staff to continously provides the highest level of global project support.    • We make staff augmentation easy so projects can be completed on-time and on-budget.

services.title: SAP Services
services.text: Our Digital Business Services is ready to help you build, succeed as an Intelligent Enterprise and accelerate faster value creation with greater visibility, focus and agility.

services.title: SAP Implementation - End to End SAP Implementation Projects
services.text: Our Implementation Services portfolio assists organizations in business transformation initiatives. Services that will help you align with your strategic business objectives, enhance productivity, reduce Total Cost of Ownership (TCO) and increase ROI. The focus is on leveraging our set of services using SAP technology to maximize the benefits our services extend to the organization: from intellectual capital, to meeting regulatory requirements and to improving business relationships with clients.Our blend of industry best practices, proven implementation methodologies, and modern configuration tools can enable you to fast-track the deployment of your SAP ERP solution.

subServices.title: Typical implementation engagement cover
text: • Implementation Project Plan and monitor the execution.
• Configure, set up and test the underlying technical infrastructure.,
• Define, design, map and configure business processes.
• Perform Change Management through effective Knowledge Transfer and end user education programs.
• Successful 'Go Live' and support· Financial closing support.

subServices.title: Roll Out
subServices.text: Roll out includes • Template rollout to geographies • Process mapping country extensions • Configuring country extensions • Custom developments for country extensions • Additional module rollouts and training and development • Deployment through change management

services.title: SAP Upgrade & Migratio – Your choice SAP Upgrade
services.text: If you’re planning to upgrade to the latest version of your SAP platform, you can partner with us to help you flawlessly upgrade your SAP system on a predictable timeline and budget and with minimal business disruption. Upgrade and Migration capabilites include Upgrade implementation plan, Deployment of environment, Migration, System testing, new system adaptability, post go live support. We help our customers to upgrade to the latest release of their solution. Our customers have the opportunity to minimize customizations to their system, and increase the ability to take advantage of complementary applications and innovative technologies and latest SAP releases. We also help in our customers moving to Cloud deployment which helps to lower total cost of ownership, and the convenience of outsourcing maintenance, support, and upgrades.

services.title: SAP Roll-Out – We make your ERP work
services.text: SeasPark Consultancy has extensive experience in Template solutions rollout for different clients across their business units and geographies. We have a unique rollout methodology that comes from a vast & in-depth knowledge of local and legal requirements across varied countries and geographies. We offer multiple delivery models wherein we can align your specific business processes, systems and strategies for achieving your business objectives. Apart from this, our ready to use SAP roll-out guidelines, standards and procedures help you accelerate the roll out process and speed up the business operations.   Rollout includes -:-

subServices.title: Additional module rollouts and training and development

services.title: SAP Expert Consultancy
services.text: The easy-to-use services provide you with the most qualified SAP consultants to help you with your specific SAP projects. Our Expert consulting services can be used for anything from one quick answer to longer-term support with no contractual commitment. The easy-to-use services provide you with the most qualified SAP consultants to help you with your specific SAP projects. The platform also includes a comprehensive dashboard to keep track of your past and current work. The scope includes – Immediate access to highly skilled independent consultants across all SAP modules and sub-modules; Online and/or on-site available consulting support; Consulting support that’s anywhere from one question to long-term; No contract commitment. We service the following SAP modules -:-

subServices.title: FI/CO, S/4 HANA, SD, MM, PP, HCM, PS, B1, ByD, BW, BI/BUSINESS OBJECTS, PM, QM

services.title: SAP Licensed Sale
services.text: Our SAP software reseller team enables you to buy the most cost-effective licences for SAP software use our expertise to identify the exact licences you need add long-term value. License optimization is not only a matter of reducing cost but the practice of continuously monitoring the demand for software in your organization, and only buying what you need. Our licensing experts can help you with license consolidation, infrastructure optimization, contract optimization, improving documentation, license transfer, or re-harvesting.    Types of Licences -:-

subServices.title: Analytics and BI Licences (Business Objects and SAC).
Additional module rollouts and training and development

services.title: SAP Business Solutions
services.text: SeasPark offers strategic consulting expertise in areas like enterprise application support, custom application development, and cutting-edge technologies such as cloud, voice interfaces, and IoT.

services.title: ERP Solutions
services.text: ERP systems are considered to be the backbone of the business information management as it establishes a measurable platform for business growth. It can be customised and easily adapted based on customer needs. The system also provides real-time reporting of everything that happens in the business process, significantly reducing the risk of data duplication and enhancing inter-departmental collaboration. At SeasPark Consultancy, we offer the following ERP Solutions -:-

subServices.title: SAP ECC
text: SAP ECC (ERP Central component) is the core of existing SAP Business suite, which has SAP ECC, SAP CRM, SAP SRM, SAP SCM, and SAP PLM. SAP business suite can run on any DB (Oracle, MSSQL, IBM DB2) including HANA. SAP ECC provides modules covering a full range of industry applications, including finance, logistics, HR, product planning and customer service, linked together into a single, customizable system run on a database of the user’s choice. We provide full life cycle services for the design, building, testing and implementation of SAP solutions for a new ECC 6 implementation.

subServices.title: S4HANA
subServices.text: SAP S4HANA is deployable on premise or cloud and provides customers with real-time analysis by processing copious amounts of data. This not only quickens the business process but also delivers more business intelligence and simplifies the IT environment drastically.  -:-  Services Offered   • S4HANA based implementation. • Migration of SAP applications. • Custom development using SAP S4HANA. • SAP HANA for Data Warehouse. • SAP HANA Administration System. • Solution Architecture for HANA.

services.title: SAP Business One
services.text: SAP Business One is a single solution that is affordable for running an entire small and mid-sized company. It includes all the major areas of most organizations including financials, sales, customer relationship management, vendor relationship management, inventory, purchasing, light manufacturing, project tracking, planning and reporting.

services.title: Digital Platform
services.text: Let SeasPark's technologists guide you through a process of planning, building, and delivering technology solutions tailored to solve your unique business challenges.

services.title: Trainings
services.text: Explore a world beyond IT staffing. SeasPark excels in recruiting Senior Managers, Directors, and VPs, ensuring your organization is powered by leaders who drive business success.

services.text: Explore our RPO's Three Pillars—People, Process, and Platform—optimized to meet your requirements, ensuring top-tier human resources despite short timelines and complex needs.
